1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Utility
4  ( -- * Generic content
5    CContent (..),
6    typeOrder,
7
8    -- * Get & Put
9    CGetPut,
10    gpText, gpList, gpSet, gpSetSort,
11
12    -- * Utility
13    isMember,
14    contAp, contMap,
15    contApTextToText,
16    contMapTextToList,
17    judgeContString,
18    contString,
19    mixBracketList,
20    mixBracketSet,
21    contMinimum, contMaximum,
22    pTermSet, pTextSet, pTextList,
23  ) where
24
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                 as O
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                     as B
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                   as S
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type                as D
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Singleton   as D
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Complex     as D
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Simple      as D
32
33
34-- ----------------------  Generic content
35
36class (Ord c, Show c, B.MixShortEncode c, D.CTypeOf c,
37       D.CEmpty c, D.CEnd c,
38       D.CBool c, D.CCode c, D.CText c, D.CClock c, D.CTime c,
39       D.CTerm c, D.CDec c, D.CType c, D.CInterp c,
40       D.CList c, D.CSet c, D.CTie c, D.CRel c) =>
41    CContent c where
42
43    appendContent :: c -> c -> B.Ab c
44
45    joinContent :: [c] -> B.Ab c
46    joinContent = B.foldM appendContent D.empty
47
48typeOrder :: (CContent c) => c -> Int
49typeOrder c
50    -- empty
51    | D.isEmpty    c = 1
52
53    -- simple
54    | D.isBool     c = 11
55    | D.isDec      c = 12
56    | D.isClock    c = 13
57    | D.isTime     c = 14
58    | D.isCode     c = 15
59    | D.isTerm     c = 16
60    | D.isText     c = 17
61
62    -- complex
63    | D.isList     c = 21
64    | D.isSet      c = 22
65    | D.isTie      c = 23
66    | D.isRel      c = 24
67    | D.isInterp   c = 25
68    | D.isType     c = 27
69
70    -- end
71    | D.isEnd      c = 31
72    | otherwise      = error "unknown content"
73
74
75-- ----------------------  Get & Put
76
77-- | Pair of get and put.
78type CGetPut a c = (c -> a, a -> c)
79
80-- | 'gText' and 'pText'.
81gpText :: (D.CText c) => CGetPut [Char] c
82gpText = (D.gText, D.pText)
83
84-- | 'gList' and 'pList'.
85gpList :: (D.CList c) => CGetPut [c] c
86gpList = (D.gList, D.pList)
87
88-- | 'gSet' and 'pSet'.
89gpSet :: (D.CSet c) => CGetPut [c] c
90gpSet = (D.gSet, D.pSet)
91
92-- | 'gSetSort' and 'pSet'.
93gpSetSort :: (Ord c, D.CSet c) => CGetPut [c] c
94gpSetSort = (D.gSetSort, D.pSet)
95
96
97-- ----------------------  Utility
98
99-- | Test membership between element and collection contents.
100isMember :: (Eq c, D.CSet c, D.CList c) => c -> c -> Bool
101isMember x xs | D.isSet xs  = x `elem` D.gSet xs
102isMember x xs | D.isList xs = x `elem` D.gList xs
103isMember _ _ = False
104
105-- | Apply function to internal value of content.
106contAp :: (c -> a) -> (b -> d) -> (a -> b) -> c -> d
107contAp get put f = put . f . get
108
109-- | Map function to internal value of content.
110contMap :: (c -> [a]) -> ([b] -> d) -> (a -> b) -> c -> d
111contMap get put f = contAp get put $ map f
112
113contApTextToText :: (D.CText c) => O.Map String -> B.AbMap c
114contApTextToText = contAp D.gText D.putText
115
116contMapTextToList :: (D.CList c, D.CText c) => (Char -> c) -> B.AbMap c
117contMapTextToList = contMap D.gText D.putList
118
119judgeContString :: (CContent c) => D.Judge c -> D.Judge String
120judgeContString = (contString <$>)
121
122-- | Convert content to string value.
123contString :: (CContent c) => c -> String
124contString = B.mixToFlatString. contStringMix
125
126-- | Convert content to pretty print doc.
127contStringMix :: (CContent c) => c -> B.MixText
128contStringMix c
129    | D.isCode   c  = B.mixString $ D.gCode c
130    | D.isText   c  = B.mixString $ D.gText c
131    | D.isTerm   c  = B.mixString $ '/' : D.gTerm c
132    | D.isDec    c  = B.mixString $ D.encodeDecimalCompact $ D.gDec c
133    | D.isClock  c  = B.mixEncode $ D.gClock c
134    | D.isTime   c  = B.mixEncode $ D.gTime c
135    | D.isBool   c  = B.mixEncode $ D.gBool c
136    | D.isEmpty  c  = B.mixEmpty
137    | D.isEnd    c  = B.mixString "(/)"
138
139    | D.isList   c  = mixBracketList $ B.mixJoinBar $ map contStringMix $ D.gList c
140    | D.isSet    c  = mixBracketSet  $ B.mixJoinBar $ map contStringMix $ D.gSet c 
141    | D.isTie    c  = B.mixString "<tie>"
142    | D.isRel    c  = B.mixString "<rel>"
143    | D.isInterp c  = B.mixString "<interp>"
144    | D.isType   c  = B.mixString "<type>"
145    | otherwise     = B.mixString "<?>"
146
147mixBracketList :: B.MixText -> B.MixText
148mixBracketList = B.mixBracketS S.listOpen S.listClose
149
150mixBracketSet :: B.MixText -> B.MixText
151mixBracketSet = B.mixBracketS S.setOpen S.setClose
152
153-- | Minimum content of contents list.
154contMinimum :: (Ord c, D.CEnd c) => [c] -> c
155contMinimum = B.minimumNull D.end
156
157-- | Maximum content of contents list.
158contMaximum :: (Ord c, D.CEmpty c) => [c] -> c
159contMaximum = B.maximumNull D.empty
160
161pTermSet :: (D.CTerm c, D.CSet c) => [String] -> c
162pTermSet = D.pSet . map D.pTerm
163
164pTextSet :: (D.CText c, D.CSet c) => [String] -> c
165pTextSet = D.pSet . map D.pText
166
167pTextList :: (D.CText c, D.CList c) => [String] -> c
168pTextList = D.pList . map D.pText
169
